name: peartube-monorepo
description: PearTube monorepo - P2P video streaming for desktop and mobile

scripts.desktop: npm run build --prefix apps/desktop && npm run preview --prefix apps/desktop
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --prefix apps/desktop && npm run typecheck --prefix packages/platform
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix apps/desktop --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix apps/mobile --legacy-peer-deps
